Package com.cs546.backend.core.externalInfluences

Class ExternalInfluenceManager

java.lang.Object
com.cs546.backend.core.externalInfluences.ExternalInfluenceManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
RoadWorksListener, GameStateObserver
public class ExternalInfluenceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements RoadWorksListener, GameStateObserver
Responsible for managing all external influences in the city.
